profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on applying existing legal tech and AI tools to improve legal processes rather than developing new AI models or systems. While AI is mentioned, the emphasis is on understanding and deploying tools, not core AI engineering.

phrases: transform a lawyer's work
improve our service delivery
optimise the processes in their matter by deploying the right tools
map legal processes, identify bottlenecks or areas for improvement, and propose concrete solutions
Investigate the opportunities of new technological developments for our practice
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand the business context of a law firm, identify areas for improvement in legal processes, and align technology solutions with business goals.

phrases: deploying the right tools
Manage and further develop these tools and processes
client portals
job_tasks.justification: This task involves managing and developing existing tools and processes, which can include aspects of software development, especially in the context of client portals and deploying specific tools.

phrases: data science
generative AI
AI
job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions data science and generative AI, suggesting some level of engagement with modeling concepts, though not necessarily deep development.

phrases: Manage and further develop these tools and processes
job_tasks.justification: Managing and developing tools and processes implies operational aspects, ensuring they function correctly and are maintained.

phrases: working together with the practice
in close cooperation with our lawyers and clients
Collaborate with lawyers, clients and colleagues from other areas of expertise and departments
Stimulate the use of tools and new ways of working in our organisation, including giving presentations on the possibilities and providing training for users
closely follow legal tech developments
Investigate the opportunities of new technological developments
find solutions to improve and/or automate our legal processes
propose concrete solutions
curious about the innovation that generative AI can bring
Stimulate the use of tools and new ways of working
